info.title: VFC Catalog API
info.description:
The `swagger-ui` view can be found [here](/api/catalog/v1/swagger).
The `ReDoc` view can be found [here](/api/catalog/v1/redoc).
The swagger YAML document can be found [here](/api/catalog/v1/swagger.yaml).
The swagger JSON document can be found [here](/api/catalog/v1/swagger.json).

post.description: Create an individual VNF package resource

get.description: Query an individual VNF package resource

delete.description: Delete an individual VNF package resource

post.description: Upload VNF package content from uri

packageType.title: Packagetype
packageType.description: Package type: VNF, PNF, NS, Service

ProblemDetails.title: Onboardingfailuredetails
ProblemDetails.description: Failure details of current onboarding procedure.It shall be present when the nsdOnboardingState attribute is CREATED and the uploading or processing fails in NFVO.

type.title: Type
type.description: A URI reference according to IETF RFC 3986 [10] that identifies the problem type.         It is encouraged that the URI provides human-readable documentation for the problem (e.g. using HTML) when dereferenced.         When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.title: Title
title.description: The HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.title: Detail
detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.title: Instance
instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.         It may yield further information if dereferenced.

additional_attributes.title: Additional attributes
additional_attributes.description: Any number of additional attributes, as defined in a specification or by an implementation.

NSD_LinkSerializer.title: links
NSD_LinkSerializer.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the onboarded individual NS descriptor resource.This identifier is allocated by the NFVO.

nsdId.title: Nsdid
nsdId.description: This identifier, which is allocated by the NSD designer,identifies the NSD in a globally unique way.It is copied from the NSD content and shall be present after the NSD content is on-boarded.

nsdName.title: Nsdname
nsdName.description: Name of the onboarded NSD.This information is copied from the NSD content and shall be present after the NSD content is on-boarded.

nsdVersion.title: Nsdversion
nsdVersion.description: Version of the on-boarded NSD.This information is copied from the NSD content and shall be present after the NSD content is on-boarded.

nsdDesigner.title: Nsddesigner
nsdDesigner.description: Designer of the on-boarded NSD.This information is copied from the NSD content and shall be present after the NSD content is on-boarded.

nsdInvariantId.title: Nsdinvariantid
nsdInvariantId.description: This identifier, which is allocated by the NSD designer,identifies an NSD in a version independent manner.This information is copied from the NSD content and shall be present after the NSD content is on-boarded.

vnfPkgIds.description: Identifies the VNF package for the VNFD referenced by the on-boarded NS descriptor resource.

pnfdInfoIds.description: Identifies the PnfdInfo element for the PNFD referenced by the on-boarded NS descriptor resource.

nestedNsdInfoIds.description: Identifies the NsdInfo element for the nested NSD referenced by the on-boarded NS descriptor resource.

nsdOnboardingState.title: Nsdonboardingstate
nsdOnboardingState.description: Onboarding state of the individual NS descriptor resource.

nsdOperationalState.title: Nsdoperationalstate
nsdOperationalState.description: Operational state of the individual NS descriptor resource.This attribute can be modified with the PATCH method.

nsdUsageState.title: Nsdusagestate
nsdUsageState.description: Usage state of the individual NS descriptor resource.

userDefinedData.title: Userdefineddata
userDefinedData.description: User defined data for the individual NS descriptor resource.This attribute can be modified with the PATCH method.

userDefinedData.title: Userdefineddata
userDefinedData.description: User-defined data for the NS descriptor resource to be created.It shall be present when the user defined data is set for the individual NS descriptor resource to be created.

_Link.title: links
_Link.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the onboarded individual PNF descriptor resource.         This identifier is allocated by the NFVO.

pnfdId.title: Pnfdid
pnfdId.description: This identifier, which is allocated by the PNFD designer,         identifies the PNFD in a globally unique way.         It is copied from the PNFD content and shall be present after the PNFD content is on-boarded.

pnfdName.title: Pnfdname
pnfdName.description: Name of the onboarded PNFD.         This information is copied from the PNFD content and shall be present after the PNFD content is on-boarded.

pnfdVersion.title: Pnfdversion
pnfdVersion.description: Version of the on-boarded PNFD.         This information is copied from the PNFD content and shall be present after the PNFD content is on-boarded.

pnfdProvider.title: Pnfdprovider
pnfdProvider.description: Provider of the on-boarded PNFD.         This information is copied from the PNFD content and shall be present after the PNFD content is on-boarded.

pnfdInvariantId.title: Pnfdinvariantid
pnfdInvariantId.description: Identifies a PNFD in a version independent manner.         This attribute is invariant across versions of PNFD.

pnfdOnboardingState.title: Pnfdonboardingstate
pnfdOnboardingState.description: Onboarding state of the individual PNF descriptor resource.

pnfdUsageState.title: Pnfdusagestate
pnfdUsageState.description: Usage state of the individual PNF descriptor resource.

userDefinedData.title: Userdefineddata
userDefinedData.description: User defined data for the individual PNF descriptor resource.         This attribute can be modified with the PATCH method.

userDefinedData.title: Userdefineddata
userDefinedData.description: User-defined data for the PNF descriptor resource to be created.It shall be present when the user defined data is set for the individual PNF descriptor resource to be created.

NsdmNotificationsFilter.title: Filter
NsdmNotificationsFilter.description: Filter settings for this subscription, to define the of all notifications this subscription relates to.

nsdInfoId.description: Match NS packages with particular nsdInfoIds

nsdId.description: Match NS Packages with particular nsdIds

nsdName.description: Match NS Packages with particular nsdNames

nsdVersion.description: match NS packages that belong to certain nsdversion

nsdInvariantId.description: Match NS Packages with particular nsdInvariantIds

vnfPkgIds.description: Match NS Packages that has VNF PackageIds

nestedNsdInfoIds.description: Match NS Packages with particular nsdInvariantIds

nsdOnboardingState.description: Match NS Packages with particular NS Onboarding State

nsdOperationalState.description: Match NS Packages with particular NS Operational State

nsdUsageState.description: Match NS Packages with particular NS Usage State

pnfdInfoIds.description: Match PF packages with particular pnfdInfoIds

pnfdId.description: Match PF packages with particular pnfdInfoIds

pnfdName.description: Match PF Packages with particular pnfdNames

pnfdVersion.description: match PF packages that belong to certain pnfd version

pnfdProvider.description: Match PF Packages with particular pnfdProvider

pnfdInvariantId.description: Match PF Packages with particular pnfdInvariantIds

pnfdOnboardingState.description: Match PF Packages with particular PNF Onboarding State

pnfdUsageState.description: Match PF Packages with particular PNF usage State

NsdmSubscriptionLink.title: links
NsdmSubscriptionLink.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

callbackUri.title: Callbackuri
callbackUri.description: The URI of the endpoint to send the notification to.

additional_details.description: Any number of additional attributes, as defined in a specification or by an implementation.

userName.title: Username
userName.description: Username to be used in HTTP Basic authentication.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to be used in HTTP Basic authentication.

clientId.title: Clientid
clientId.description: Client identifier to be used in the access token request of the OAuth 2.0 client credentials grant type.

clientPassword.title: Clientpassword
clientPassword.description: Client password to be used in the access token request of the OAuth 2.0 client credentials grant type.

tokenEndpoint.title: Tokenendpoint
tokenEndpoint.description: The token endpoint from which the access token can be obtained.

SubscriptionAuthentication.title: Authentication
SubscriptionAuthentication.description: Authentication parameters to configure the use of Authorization when sending notifications corresponding to this subscription.

authType.description: Defines the types of Authentication / Authorization which the API consumer is willing to accept when receiving a notification.

callbackUri.title: Callbackuri
callbackUri.description: The URI of the endpoint to send the notification to.

LinkSelf.title: links
LinkSelf.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

Version.title: Versions
Version.description: match VNF packages that contain VNF products with certain versions

vnfdVersions.description: Match VNF packages that contain VNF products with certain VNFD versions

vnfProducts.title: Vnfproducts
vnfProducts.description: match VNF packages that contain VNF products with certain product names, from one particular provider

vnfProductName.title: Vnfproductname
vnfProductName.description: Name of the VNF product to match.

vnfProductsProviders.title: Vnfproductsfromproviders
vnfProductsProviders.description: Match VNF packages that contain VNF products from certain providers.

vnfProvider.title: Vnfprovider
vnfProvider.description: Name of the VNFprovider to match.

PkgmNotificationsFilter.title: Filter
PkgmNotificationsFilter.description: Filter settings for this subscription, to define the subset of all notifications this subscription relates to

vnfdId.description: Match VNF packages with a VNFD identifierlisted in the attribute

vnfPkgId.description: Match VNF packages with a VNFD identifierlisted in the attribute

operationalState.description: Operational state of the VNF package.

usageState.description: Operational state of the VNF package.

callbackUri.title: Callbackuri
callbackUri.description: The URI of the endpoint to send the notification to.

Checksum.title: Checksum
Checksum.description: Checksum of the on-boarded VNF package.

algorithm.title: Algorithm
algorithm.description: Name of the algorithm used to generate the checksum.

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: The hexadecimal value of the checksum.

VnfPackageSoftwareImageInfo.description: Information about VNF package artifacts that are software images.

containerFormat.title: Containerformat
containerFormat.description: terminationType: Indicates whether forceful or graceful termination is requested.

diskFormat.title: Diskformat
diskFormat.description: Disk format of a software image is the format of the underlying disk image.

createdAt.title: Createdat
createdAt.description: Time when this software image was created.

minDisk.title: Mindisk
minDisk.description: The minimal disk for this software image in bytes.

minRam.title: Minram
minRam.description: The minimal RAM for this software image in bytes.

size.title: Size
size.description: Size of this software image in bytes.

VnfPackageArtifactInfo.description: Information about VNF package artifacts contained in the VNF package that are not software images.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The metadata of the artifact that are available in the VNF package

VNF_PKGM_Link_Serializer.title: links
VNF_PKGM_Link_Serializer.description: Links to resources related to this resource.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the on-boarded VNF package.

vnfdId.title: Vnfdid
vnfdId.description: This identifier, which is managed by the VNF provider, identifies the VNF package and the VNFD in a globally unique way.

vnfProvider.title: Vnfprovider
vnfProvider.description: Provider of the VNF package and the VNFD.

vnfProductName.title: Vnfproductname
vnfProductName.description: Name to identify the VNF product.

softwareImages.description: Information about VNF package artifacts that are software images.

additionalArtifacts.description: Information about VNF package artifacts contained in the VNF package that are not software images.

onboardingState.title: Onboardingstate
onboardingState.description: On-boarding state of the VNF package.

operationalState.title: Operationalstate
operationalState.description: Operational state of the VNF package.

usageState.title: Usagestate
usageState.description: Usage state of the VNF package.

userDefinedData.title: Userdefineddata
userDefinedData.description: User defined data for the VNF package.

userDefinedData.title: Userdefineddata
userDefinedData.description: User defined data for the VNF package.

addressInformation.title: Addressinformation
addressInformation.description: Address information of the VNF package content.

userName.title: Username
userName.description: User name to be used for authentication.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to be used for authentication.
